lines.gurmukhi: rwg jwq rwgI jwnY bYrwgY bYrwgI jwnY iqAwgih iqAwgI jwnY dIn dieAw dwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Raag Jaat Raagee Jaanai Bairaagai Bairaagee Jaanai , Tiaagahi Tiaagee Jaanai Deen Daiaa Daan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A musician alone knows the modes of music and singing and their various forms. Only a renunciator who has given up his attachment with worldly goods know what a detached temperament is, a hermit alone knows what it involves and a donor would know what it

lines.gurmukhi: jog jugq jogI jwnY Bog rs BogI jwnY rog doK rogI jwnY pRgt bKwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jog Jougat Jogee Jaanai Bhog Ras Bhogee Jaanai , Rog Dokh Rogee Jaanai Pragat Bakhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly a Yogi knows the method of strenuous penances that are required to be practiced for realisation of God. A relisher would know how to enjoy the taste and enjoyment of worldly tastes and this can be emphatically stated that a patient alone knows t

lines.gurmukhi: PUl rwK mwlI jwnY pwnih qMbolI jwnY skl sugMiD giq gwNDI jwnau jwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Dhool Raakh Maalee Jaanai Paanahi Tanbolee Jaanai , Sakal Sougandhi Gati Gaandhee Jaanau Jaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A gardener knows how to take care of flowers, a betel leaf seller alone knows how to preserve betel leaves. One can learn the secret of scents from a perfume seller.

lines.gurmukhi: rqnY jauhwrI jwnY ibhwrY ibauhwrI jwnY Awqm pRIiKAw koaU ibbykI pihcwn hY ]675]
lines.transliteration_english: Ratanai Jauhaaree Jaanai Bihaarai Biuhaaree Jaanai , Aatam Preekhiaa Kooo Bibaykee Pahichaan Hai ?675?

Shabad OS B.translation: Only a jeweller knows how to evaluate and examine the genuineness of a jewel. A trader knows all aspects of business but he who can recognise the reality of spiritual virtues is a rare, wise and knowledgeable person who has imbibed the teachings of Guru .
